name: Lantern (itch) (qatoqat)
description:
It's night time and a cat is having a nap. Lantern light goes off and cat wakes up to find light for its naptime. 

Use arrow keys or WASD to move around. AZERTY, je suis désolé

Hold shift to charge jump / to move fast.

Press 'hint' key (Q, E, R) to interact with objects. Press Q to unpick objects. (Um, the coffee machine is not that interactable/animated, yet)

Art, story and programming by qatoqat, with helps from pals and mutuals

(credit should go here )

Font used is GamePixies

More projects incoming. Support us on Ko-Fi !
